name: gocd-server
description: Automates the creation of a GOCD Docker Container.

scripts.go: echo 'Recreating docker containers...' && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File Scripts\go.ps1
scripts.geterror: echo 'Getting docker container errors...' && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File Scripts\geterror.ps1
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating GoCD environment...' && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File Scripts\validate.ps1

author: Solomio S. Sisante
